document.full_text: greece will present new fiscal and privatization plans on friday in an attempt to convince investors it can meet the terms of an eu/imf bailout and avoid restructuring its debt.
document.title: greece plans new measures, denies debt restructuring
lines_and_colors: greece will present new fiscal and privatization plans on friday in an attempt to convince investors it can meet the terms of an eu/imf bailout and avoid restructuring its debt.
